gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 114, Heat 108
gameRecap.excerpt: Dallas defeats Miami, 114-108. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way with his 15th triple double of the year and 71st of his career with 35 points (seven 3PM), 11 rebounds, and 11 assists while aided by Kyrie Irving (23 points, four rebounds, and four assists) in the victory. Terry Rozier recorded 27 points (five 3PM), six rebounds, and 11 assists with Duncan Robinson tallying 19 points (five 3PM) and four rebounds for Miami in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 35-28, while Miami moves to 35-27 in the loss.
